headline: Why The WEC Energy Group (WEC) Story Is Shifting With Mixed Targets And Updated Guidance
summary: WEC Energy Group’s modelled fair value has shifted from US$121.03 to US$121.74, a modest change that still matters if you are tracking where the consensus is migrating. That small upward move lines up with the mixed analyst research, where some firms have lifted price targets while others trimmed them, leaving a mild net increase and an active debate around execution and valuation. Read on to see how you can interpret these evolving targets and keep your own view grounded as the narrative...
